title: Yervand Sukiasyan
text:
Yervand Garsevanovich Sukiasyan (, born on 20 January 1967 in <a href="Yerevan">Yerevan</a>, <a href="Soviet%20Armenia">Soviet Armenia</a>) is a former <a href="Armenia">Armenia</a>n professional <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="defender%20%28football%29">defender</a>. He played in 35 international matches for the <a href="Armenia%20national%20football%20team">Armenia national team</a> since his debut in 1994.
Sukiasyan finished his playing career with <a href="Kerkyra%20F.C.">Kerkyra F.C.</a> in the Greek <a href="Gamma%20Ethniki">Gamma Ethniki</a>.
